title: contrib/gdata has many javadoc warnings
description:
All other javadoc warnings/errors were resolved in LUCENE-875. 
Resolving the warnings also in gdata would allow to enable the 'fail-on-javadoc-warning' logic in 'ant javadocs' target.

comments.content:
I do not have any resources available for gdata at the moment thats also the reason why there is no development at the moment. I will try to get the java doc warnings task done within the next week!

best regards simon
comments.author: Simon Willnauer

comments.content:
Clearing the fix version as this shouldn't block a 2.2 release. 

Still, it would be nice to get these javadoc warnings fixed!
comments.author: Michael Busch

comments.content: This is irrelevant now that contrib/gdata is gone (too bad, wasted time/effort  )
comments.author: Otis Gospodnetic
